title: Awesome t210-8 GHOST/Wet-Sheet Transfer for sale....price lowered 3/25!

posts.post_title: Awesome t210-8 GHOST/Wet-Sheet Transfer for sale....price lowered 3/25!
posts.post_content:
Similar to the t205 Collins which I offered up for sale yesterday, here's another great example of a card that has a Wet-sheet transfer (ghost) of the back of the card overprinted onto the front.  Here you can see the Old Mill Reverse is very sharp and easily readable on the front of this Series 8 Bauer.  

Asking $1195 delivered....would also trade for t204 HOFers, e107 HOFers or Ruth/Cobb/Wagner cards

Thanks in advance!
Brian
[url]redmaccie@hotmail.com[/url]
